goal: Achieve top 3 organic rankings for national and local moving-related searches across Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo.

technical_fixes.task: Create sitemap.xml and submit to Google Search Console
Add robots.txt file with crawl rules
Compress all hero images to WebP
Enable browser caching and minify JS/CSS
Implement canonical URLs to prevent duplicates
Add GA4 tracking and Search Console verification

on_page_issues.fix: Add 150–160 character summary including 'packers and movers USA'
Add blog section link in homepage footer and hero
Link from footer and Join Partner CTA
Add CTA 'Ask AI for Moving Help' on homepage
Link only after login or from join page

recommendations: Link blog and partners in homepage footer
Add contextual links to /local-moving, /packing-services within service descriptions

content_recommendations: Create /locations page with top 20 US cities (New York, Los Angeles, Houston, Chicago, Miami, etc.)
Add /movers-near-me page targeting long-tail local search queries
Develop moving tips blog series to capture informational traffic
Add customer testimonials under /reviews for credibility and SEO-rich text

local_seo_tasks.task: Create and verify Google Business Profile (Lugvia – Nationwide Movers)
Add structured address and phone number in footer
Submit NAP citations to Yelp, BBB, Angi, Thumbtack, Nextdoor, MapQuest
Collect Google Reviews with keywords like 'movers in Dallas'

informational: how to pack for a long distance move
best time to move houses USA

ai_action_map.action: Generate optimized meta descriptions for all key pages
Auto-link underlinked pages based on keyword proximity
Rewrite hero content using target keywords and CTA
Detect and add missing schema.org JSON-LD
Create AI-generated blog drafts from keyword_targets.informational
Analyze Core Web Vitals and compress heavy assets

Add LocalBusiness schema and GA4 tracking
Create About Us, Reviews, and Movers Near Me pages
